1: <mistake>@@//yen/dbus</mistake> las dbu ma <mistake>ba</mistake> nyid dang //me mtshams stan dang ldan pa <mistake>i /sga</mistake> yig i dang <mistake>spyor</mistake> nas su//lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya//rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa <mistake>yang//</mistake>
2: sgra yig i dang <mistake>spbyor</mistake> byas te//tsheg drag lhan cig 'dod <mistake>pa'o//dedag</mistake> mda' rnon 'dzin ma la sogs pa <mistake>gra'i</mistake> srin mo la sogs bzhi rnams <mistake>ke'o//me</mistake> tog ma sogs 'dus pa dang //sgo <mistake>srungs</mistake> ma
3: sogs 'dus pa <mistake>ste //rtsa</mistake> <mistake>ba'</mistake> dkyil 'khor tshul <mistake>kyis</mistake> <mistake>na//ji</mistake> bzhin yang dag 'byung <mistake>ba'o //zhes</mistake> bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin <mistake>du</mistake> dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo <mistake>rjes</mistake> sems dpas
4: gsungs <mistake>te//rdo</mistake> rje mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor <mistake>la//sngags</mistake> 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes <mistake>pa'o//okyig</mistake> thig le dang ldan <mistake>par //dbus</mistake> las dbu ma bzung byas te//bden bral phyi rol
5: pa la sogs//dbus las <mistake>bchi</mistake> pa gang yin <mistake>pa// sgra</mistake> yig a dang sbyor bar bya//dbus las dbu ma bzung ba <mistake>dang//dbang</mistake> ldan phyi rol gnas pa la//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//byang las <mistake>bzhing</mistake>
6: gang yin pa//rtseg mar de bzhin lci bar 'dod//dbus las dang po bzung ba <mistake>dang//byang</mistake> nas dbu ma yang yin te//dbus las tha ma dang sbyor ba//brgyad par yongs su grags pa yin//byang nas
7: tha mar de bzhin du//o yig me mtshams dang ldan <mistake>pa //byang</mistake> nas dang po yang yin te//dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor te//dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa <mistake>yang//me</mistake> mtshams 'dab ma bzung nas <mistake>su///</mistake>
8: rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la//me mtshams pa stan ldan byas <mistake>te//tshog</mistake> drag i yis sbyor bas so//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig thig le
